title: Salmon with a quinoa salad and ginger sauce
description: A healthy and filling dish with lots of delicious veggies and plenty of protein to keep you feeling full. For this recipe you will need a food processor and a griddle pan.
ingredients: 200g/7oz fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
½ small cauliflower, cut into florets and thinly sliced
1 courgette, thinly sliced on an angle
4 salmon fillets (200-250g/7-9oz each), skin-on and pin boned
